headline: Ecolab Earns Double ‘A’ Rating from CDP for Leadership in Water and Climate Performance
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., January 08, 2026--Ecolab Inc., a global sustainability leader offering water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions and services that protect people and the resources vital to life, has earned a top spot on CDP’s respected annual A List for its continued leadership in corporate transparency and performance on water and climate. This marks the seventh consecutive year of being recognized by CDP for water leadership and the fifth consecutive year for climate leadership.
